events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer role and are excited to proceed with the next steps.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on the candidateâ€™s experience and skills.
A recruiter specialized in software development roles has been assigned to manage the communication and screening process for this candidate.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening, demonstrating solid knowledge in software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to our screening feedback and expressed eagerness to move forward with the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 16th to assess deeper engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
